name: AccentGame
0:
”Alexa play Accent Game”
”Alexa start Accent Game”
”Alexa open Accent Game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: accent game
des:
Accent Game is a new and exciting social game to help break the ice and have a blast listening to others trying accents, characters, or different ways to communicate! Ask Alexa to play Accent Game and she will call out an accent, character or way to communicate that everyone can immediately engage in! You can judge who had the funniest, closest or most out of character for them, or just spend a few minutes having fun communicating in this new way before moving on to the next one!

To start, just say "Alexa, play Accent Game" or "Alexa, open Accent Game" to get your first challenge".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
